content: charlotte cord braid & tinker what is this well essentially it s an icord that you can use as a necktie ribbon shawlette headband armband… whatever you like what do i need i used drops air in a carmine red colour colour number 44 but you can use any scrap yarn you have drops air is a blow yarn check the yarn sub website for comparable yarns for needles i used a size 4 5 mm us 7 but a size 5 mm us 8 might even be nicer bigger and fluffier icords are where it s at you need either dpn s or circular knitting needles what do i do cast on 5 stitches with long tail cast-on and knit it up as an icord 1 slide the stitches to the right of the needle if using dpn s or the right most needle if using circulars 2 knit your 5 stitches don t turn your work keep the yarn in the back don t accidentally move it to the front or wrap your work 3 slide your stitches to the right of the needle or the right most needle 4 repeat occasionally pull your work down to make the stitches fall into place 5 keep at it until the work meassures 1 meter approx 40 inches 6 bind off and weave in the ends this pattern was created by me melanie as a sort of joke for my knitting youtube channel braid & tinker you should check it out https //www youtube com/@braidandtinker
